common.is_granted_permission_failed: In order to use Opacity to the fullest, we need storage permissions on your device

glossary.save_changes: Don’t want to save the changes?

sign_up.dont_share_handle:
Your handle will be used to access your files.
Do not share this with anyone.
sign_up.privacy_and_security: Your Privacy and Security is in your hands

sign_in.privacy_hands: Your Privacy and Security is in your hands

forgot_account.recovery_instructions_1: If you have lost your Opacity Account Handle, you can recover it using the 12 word mnemonic phrase provided when you signed up for your account.
forgot_account.recovery_instructions_2: Please enter the 12 words below in the exact order originally provided with a space between each word. Then click “Recover Account Handle”
forgot_account.incorrect_recovery: Did you enter your recovery phrase correctly?

mnemonic_phrase.title: Mnemonic Phrase
mnemonic_phrase.dont_forget_handle: If you forget your handle, you will need to present these words in the exact order to recover your account.
mnemonic_phrase.dont_share: Do not share these with anyone.

mnemonic_verify.title: Mnemonic Verification
mnemonic_verify.dont_share: Do not share these with anyone.
mnemonic_verify.wrong_phrases:
Did you save your recovery phrase?
That doesn’t look right.

account_create.lets_upload: That’s it. Now let’s get some files uploaded.

home.no_files:
You don’t have any files
Let’s start by adding one below
home.risk_no_back_up: Your account is at risk until you back up your recovery phrases. Make sure to backup as soon as you can.
home.need_permissions_desc: In order to continue backing up from your camera roll
home.failure_upload: There was a failure uploading {{count}} file
home.failure_upload_plural: There was a failure uploading {{count}} files
home.syncing_files_subtitle: We're checking if there’s any new media to automatically upload..
home.failure_downloading_your_files: There was a failure downloading your files
home.failure_downloading_your_file: There was a failure downloading your file

files.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete files from your account?

starred.no_files_desc:
You haven’t starred any files yet.

Star some to keep track of everything
easily.

carousel.carousel_description_1: Get access to file storage without needing to give us any sensitive information like name, phone number or email.
carousel.carousel_title_2: One Handle To Access Your Account
carousel.carousel_description_2: Easy sign up and sign in process. Get started in seconds.
carousel.carousel_title_3: Encrypted At Rest Share Only What You Want
carousel.carousel_description_3: We keep your data safe and secure while giving you granular controls over what you want to share and when.

get_started.title: Turn Your Opacity Up
get_started.description: Still thinking? Tap the button below to get started immediately.

profile.get_support_desc: If you have any issue just give us a message

about.copied_handle: Your handle has been copied to your clipboard!

backupTracker.permissionDetail: in order to continue backing up from your Camera Roll

fileSyncOptions.wantToAutomaticallyBackup:
Want to automatically
backup from your
camera roll?

camera_uploads.all_media_desc: All media in your camera roll will be backed up
camera_uploads.new_media_only_desc: New media will be automatically uploaded
camera_uploads.auto_camera_upload_desc_off: Media will not be automatically uploaded
camera_uploads.auto_sync_warning_update_config_desc: Changing auto sync settings will reset upload order and you'll lose progress for files currently being uploaded. Do you want to continue?
camera_uploads.auto_sync_warning_turn_off_desc: Disabling{{title}} will stop {{item}} from syncing automatically, do you want to continue?

accessPhotoLibrary.title: Please allow Opacity to access your Photo Library
accessPhotoLibrary.description: To upload or save photos, please open Settings and select “Allow Access to All Photos”.  By choosing this, it will not give Opacity permission to upload photos without your consent.

options.name: Name
options.unable_to_share: In order to share privately, please revoke the existing public sharing link

file_sharing.title: Share Your File
file_sharing.anyone_with: ANYONE WITH THIS LINK CAN VIEW THE FILE
file_sharing.link_not_gen: Oops, we were unable to create a sharing link for you. Please try again in a few moments.
file_sharing.this_file_is_opacity: This file is opacity public file, Everyone can use this file!
file_sharing.permission_revoke_failed: Oops, we were unable to revoke this link. Please try again in a few moments.
file_sharing.error_public_while_private: Can't get public share link while creating a private one!
file_sharing.error_private_while_public: Can't private share link while creating a public one!
file_sharing.revoke_public_share_confirmation: Are you sure you would like to revoke this public share link?
file_sharing.revoke_public_share_confirmation_on_priv: It looks like you already have already publicly shared this file. Would you like to revoke this in order to privately share?

rename_files.error_rename_file: Oops, we were unable to rename the file
rename_files.error_rename_folder: Oops, we were unable to rename the folder
rename_files.error_rename_with_same_value: Oops, name should be different than existing one

remove_files.remove_confirmation:
Are you sure you want to delete
 {{filename}}?
remove_files.error_delete_file: Oops, we were unable to remove the file
remove_files.error_delete_files: Oops, we were unable to remove the files
remove_files.error_delete_folder: Oops, we were unable to remove the folder
remove_files.error_account_system_not_empty: Oops, we’re unable to delete folders which are not empty. Please delete or move all the files inside of folder {{name}} and then try again.

camera.required_permission_camera_desc: Please provide camera access in the settings to use this feature

file_uploads.size_limit: Sorry, currently only files less than 100MB can be uploaded

error.folder_already_exists: A folder with the same name already exists in current directory!

manage_files.empty_section_uploading_nextup: No files in the queue to be uploaded.
manage_files.empty_section_downloading_nextup: No files in the queue to be downloaded.
manage_files.empty_section_uploading_completed: No files have been completed yet.
manage_files.empty_section_uploading_incomplete: No files have been canceled or failed yet.
